definition: pocket/bag/to wrap up or hold in a bag/to move in a circle/to canvas or solicit/to take responsibility for/to disclose in detail/combat armor (old)

sentences.english: It was like a cup of cold water hurled over my head.
sentences.chinese: 这像是兜头给我泼了一瓢冷水。

with a crash/with a thunderous noise
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it
